Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class LobbyManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.LobbyManager
public class LobbyManager extends Object
This class handle the lobby. When client joins it is queued. If it's the first in line, he is asked to provide number of player and game mode. When there's enough player a match is created.

  • Constructor Details

    • LobbyManager

  • Method Details

    • addClient

      public void addClient(String nickname, SocketConnection socketConnection)
      Add a client to the queue in the lobby, and broadcast to the other that this client has been added. If the new client in lobby is the first in line, it's asked about the desired game mode and number of player. When a client is added it is checked if the desires of the first client in line are satisfied.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the new client in line.
      socketConnection - the entity that represents the connection.

    • checkReadyToStart

      public void checkReadyToStart()
      Check if the desires of the first player are satisfied, in this case a game begin and if there's still players in the queue the first is asked the game mode and number of players.

    • removePlayerFromLobby

      public void removePlayerFromLobby(String name)

    • onUpdateGameMode

      public void onUpdateGameMode(ChooseGameModeNotification chooseGameModeMsg)
      Receive an update with the chosen game mode and number of player, now the game can start if the desires are satisfied.
      Parameters:
      chooseGameModeMsg - the notification with the chosen game mode and number of player

    • handleDisconnection

      public void handleDisconnection(String nickname)
      Handle the case of a disconnection when a player is in the lobby. The disconnected player is removed from the lobby. If it is the first in line, and it was asked about the game mode, a new player (the new first in line) is asked to provide them.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the disconnected client

    • startMatch

      private void startMatch()
      Start a match when the desires of the first player in line are satisfied. A new GameController is created and the player in game are removed from the lobby. After this the lobby is capable of creating a new match.

    • broadcast

      private void broadcast(String message)
      Broadcast a message to all clients in lobby
      Parameters:
      message - the notification to broadcast

    • broadcast

      private void broadcast(String message, String exclusion)
      Broadcast a message to all clients in lobby except the exclusion provided.
      Parameters:
      message - the notification to broadcast
      exclusion - the nick of the client to not sent the notification to
